title: Blood and Sand Recipe
full_text:
Blood and Sand Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
blended Scotch
(
Famous Grouse
is a good brand to use)
1
ounce
fresh-squeezed orange juice
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
3/4
ounce
Cherry Heering
(no, not "herring," and yes, the brand matters)
Directions
Pour all of ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice, and shake well for 10 seconds; strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with a cherry.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
